prompt_engine.description: üöÄ PROMPT TEMPLATE ENGINE [HOT-RELOADED]: Processes prompt templates and returns instructions for YOU (the client LLM) to execute. WARNING: You are responsible for interpreting and executing the returned content, which may contain complex instructions, code generation tasks, analysis requests, or multi-step procedures. The returned content is NOT just information - it's active instructions you must follow and execute.
prompt_engine.shortDescription: üî• DYNAMICALLY UPDATED: Process prompt templates and return executable instructions

parameters.command: Prompt name and arguments to process. WARNING: Will return instructions for YOU to execute, not just information. SIMPLE: >>prompt_name content | ADVANCED: JSON with execution options
parameters.gate_validation: Quality gate validation (MANDATORY for chains, auto-detected by default, see metadata sections for gate details)
parameters.llm_driven_execution: Enable LLM-driven chain step coordination (requires semantic LLM integration)
parameters.force_restart: Force restart chain from beginning, clearing all existing state
parameters.session_id: Specific session ID to use or resume
parameters.chain_uri: Full chain URI for precise session control (e.g., chain://research_pipeline/session-abc123?force_restart=true)

frameworkAware.enabled: üöÄ PROMPT TEMPLATE ENGINE [HOT-RELOADED + FRAMEWORK-ENHANCED]: Processes prompt templates with intelligent framework methodology injection and returns instructions for YOU (the client LLM) to execute. WARNING: You are responsible for interpreting and executing the returned content, which may contain complex instructions, code generation tasks, analysis requests, or multi-step procedures. Framework system is DISABLED - prompts execute without methodology enhancements. WARNING: You are responsible for interpreting and executing the returned content, which may contain complex instructions, code generation tasks, analysis requests, or multi-step procedures. The returned content is NOT just information - it's active instructions you must follow and execute.

parametersEnabled.execution_mode: Override intelligent auto-detection with framework-aware selection (default: auto, framework-enhanced)

parametersDisabled.execution_mode: Override intelligent auto-detection (default: auto, no framework enhancement)

prompt_manager.description:
üìù INTELLIGENT PROMPT MANAGER: Complete lifecycle management with configurable analysis, category organization, and comprehensive CRUD operations. Handles create, update, delete, modify, reload, and list operations with intelligent feedback.

üî¨ ANALYSIS MODES:
- 'structural': Honest analysis based on template structure (default)
- 'semantic': LLM-powered intelligent analysis (requires future API integration)

üéØ Type-specific creation commands:
- 'create_prompt': Create basic prompt (fast variable substitution)
- 'create_template': Create framework-aware template (intelligent analysis)
- 'analyze_type': Analyze existing prompt and recommend type
- 'migrate_type': Convert between prompt and template types

parameters.action: Management action: 'create' (auto-detect type), 'create_prompt' (basic prompt), 'create_template' (framework-aware), 'analyze_type' (recommend type), 'migrate_type' (convert type), 'update', 'delete', 'modify', 'reload', 'list'
parameters.id: Prompt ID (required for update, delete, modify operations)
parameters.name: Display name for the prompt
parameters.filter: Filter prompts by structured patterns (type:prompt/template, category:code, gates:yes) or fuzzy text search (name/description matching, multi-word support)
